text: Cyanotech Corporation is a micro-algae producing company leasing land in the Natural Energy Lab of Hawaii on the Kona Coast of the island of Hawaii. The company produces BioAstin® Natural Astaxanthin and Hawaiian Spirulina Pacifica. ==History== Cyanotech was co-founded in 1983 by Gerry Cysewski.https://www.bloomberg.com/research/stocks/people/person.asp?personId=318449&ticker;=CYAN The Bioastin brand was approved by the FDA as the first generally recognized as safe product containing Astaxanthin in 1999.https://www.fda.gov/ohrms/dockets/dailys/00/Sep00/092000/let5680.pdf ==References== Category:Dietary supplements
title: Cyanotech
